question: what will help stretch foreskin?
question_content: what will help stretch foreskin? It is very tight

answers.answer_content:
Adrian, 
 You stretch it by pulling outward with two fingers rather like pulling open a balloon to fit over a spigot when making water balloons. The normal up-down w@nking motion will help, but don't pull back so hard it hurts or makes things red and sore. 
Look, your foreskin should retract normally with the growth of your penis. If you do not have pain when erect or when w@nking off, you do not "need" to retract. I you just want to, try stretching it "out" instead of back. Do some research on your own. 
Good luck, and have fun.

I borrowed these links from another popular responders here.

Regular stretching is the best way.  Stretch it just a bit every time you shower, every time you urinate, every time you masturbate, and every time your hand is near it for any reason.  If your foreskin is unusually tight, you can get a steroid cream from your doctor that will make the stretching easier.
hm slowly start to pull back when showering, or play with your self Yes yes i know it sounds funny or wrong but your pulling it forward and back which will help.
